CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Bensonborough Storm?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Bensonborough Storm is arc {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Bensonborough Storm?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Bensonborough Storm is arc {New Chiefs}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Bensonborough Storm} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {New Chiefs} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Eddiehaven Panthers to Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Eddiehaven Panthers to New Chiefs in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from New Chiefs to Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between New Chiefs and Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between New Chiefs and Bensonborough Storm is {733}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between New Chiefs and Eddiehaven Panthers in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between New Chiefs and Eddiehaven Panthers is {317}.

What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from New Chiefs?
SC.A: The total flow output from New Chiefs is {1248}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Eddiehaven Panthers?
SC.A: The total flow input by Eddiehaven Panthers is {719}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 624? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {636} from {New Chiefs} to {Bensonborough Storm}, a flow of {733} from {Bensonborough Storm} to {New Chiefs}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 310? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {107} from {Bensonborough Storm} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}, a flow of {304} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {Bensonborough Storm}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 310 and 464? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {317} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {New Chiefs}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Eddiehaven Panthers to Bensonborough Storm or from Eddiehaven Panthers to New Chiefs?
NC.A: The flow from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {New Chiefs} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Eddiehaven Panthers to Bensonborough Storm, from New Chiefs to Eddiehaven Panthers, or from Bensonborough Storm to Eddiehaven Panthers?
NC.A: The flow from {New Chiefs} to {Eddiehaven Panthers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {New Chiefs}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Bensonborough Storm} and {New Chiefs}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Bensonborough Storm, Arc New Chiefs, Arc Eddiehaven Panthers}.
